sentence.Network_en: His music is a haunting mix of guitar, synthesizer, oriental gongs and bells.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的音乐是由吉他 、 电子音响合成器以及东方的锣和钟的声音混合而成.

sentence.Network_en: Martha somehow rounded up a Moog synthesizer and two guitars.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛莎不知道那里找来一个穆格电子音响合成器和两把吉他.

sentence.Network_en: A mode in which a text - to - speech synthesizer attempts correct pronunciation of all phrases sent to it.
sentence.Network_cn: 正文 - 语音合成器对传给它的所有短语的发音进行校正的一种方式.

entry.def: A synthesizer is an electronic machine that produces speech, music, or other sounds, usually by combining individual syllables or sounds that have been previously recorded.

example.ex: Now he can only communicate through a voice synthesiser.
example.tran: 现在他只能通过声音合成器与人沟通。

means.word_mean: 1. an intellectual who synthesizes or uses synthetic methods
2. (music) an electronic instrument (usually played with a keyboard) that generates and modifies sounds electronically and can imitate a variety of other musical instruments
